animeTitle: Dr. Slump Movie 01: Arale-chan Hello! Fushigi Shima
otherNames: Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: Hello! Wonder Island, Dr.スランプ アラレちゃん ハロー！不思議島
synopsis: rofessor Senbei finds a videotape of his deceased father providing instructions on how to create a love potion. The main ingredient is a tear of the evil Gyaasuka Daimao who lives at the Wonder Island. To retrieve it, Senbei takes Arale and Gatchan on a wacky adventure.
